title: Tic Tac Toe Master puzzle 🎯 Click here to play for free
name: Tic Tac Toe Master puzzle
shortDesc: Challenge yourself on a traditional 3 X 3 grid or in custom board sizes from 5×5 to 8×8. TicTacToe Master is a highly skilled 2 player game where the goal is to take turns marking the correct spaces.
description:
TicTacToe Master is a highly skilled 2 player game where the goal is to take turns marking the correct spaces, playing against the computer or a friend. Challenge yourself on a traditional 3 X 3 grid or in custom board sizes from 5×5 to 8×8. 
Tic-tac-toe is a fun game that you can play any time and anywhere as long as you have a piece of paper, a pencil, and an opponent. Tic-tac-toe is a zero-sum game, which means that if both players are playing their best, then neither player will win. However, if you learn how to play tic-tac-toe and master some simple strategies, then you'll be able to not only play but win the majority of the time. If you want to know how to play tic-tac-toe, then see Step 1 to get started.
howToPlay:
Draw the board. First, you have to draw the board, which is made up of a 3 x 3 grid of squares. This means it has three rows of three squares. Some people play with a 4 x 4 grid, but that is for more advanced players, and we will focus on the 3 x 3 grid here.

Have the first player go first. Though traditionally, the first player goes with "X", you can allow the first player to decide whether to go with "X"s or to go with "O"s. These symbols will be placed on the table, in an attempt to have three of them in a row. If you're going first, then the best move you can make is to move into the center. This will maximize your chances of winning since you'll be able to create a row of three "X"s or "O"s in more combinations (4) this way than if you chose a different square.

Have the second player go second. After the first player goes, then the second player should put down his symbol, which will be different from the symbol of the first player. The second player can either try to block the first player from creating a row of three or focus on creating their row of three. Ideally, the player can do both.
features:
Different Board Sizes: Customize your game experience by choosing from multiple grid sizes.
Dual Game Mode: Play against AI or challenge a friend using the same device.
Skill-based Gameplay: Refine your strategic thinking skills while having fun.

title: Sort Parking 🎯 Click here to play for free
name: Sort Parking
shortDesc: Interesting and fun parking game. It's time to get out of the parking lot, but other cars are blocking your way!
description: It's time to get out of the parking lot, but other cars are blocking your way! Move them in the right order to clear the way! Tight parking spaces, challenging obstacles and unexpected challenges are waiting for you in this exciting and engaging game.
howToPlay:
The concept of assorted parking is fairly simple. You need to use logic to park cars of similar colors in a row, making sure there aren't weird cars stuck in the parking lot with mismatched colors.

At the start of the game, cars of all colors are parked together. You will have a row of cars of mixed colors: brown, red, yellow, and blue, but your goal is to park cars of the same color in the same row, so all red cars are parked in one row, brown cars in one row, and so on.

There are several rows that are empty - you need to fill these rows strategically. Once you place a color in an empty row, you have to add the same color in that row. Cars cannot be placed in front of cars of different colors, so once you start a row, make sure you have a plan to fill it.

When you fill up an entire row with one color, the row is locked. Lock them all and complete the stage.
features:
After completing a level, you can increase your points by tapping the highest spinning number. It seems easy, but these numbers spin pretty fast.

What can you do with the points?

You can use game coins to unlock more car models. Complete levels to collect background pieces; when matched, you can change the background to a new theme.
